title: Daily SPF Moisturizer for Bright, Smooth Skin | RevitaLift | L’Oreal
description:
When we asked Jennifer Lopez what she wanted her skin to to be, she said, “bright, smooth with a little glow.” In just one week get that smooth, hydrated look with L’Oreal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Day Moisturizer.

Introducing the new Bright Reveal Brightening Day Moisturizer made with glycolic acid, the additive that dermatologists. The daily moisturizer diminishes dullness and visibly reduces wrinkles for brighter looking skin. The hydrating SPF 30 moisturizer is clinically tested to reveal more radiant skin while protecting against the sun’s aging UVA/UVB rays. Reveal brighter, younger looking skin in just one week with Bright Reveal by L’Oreal Paris.
